item.title: Szia! Tudod, hogy a 83-as régi koroncói ágával mi lesz/van? Átraktad construction-re. Megmarad, de csak északi irányú felhajtó lesz? Vagy teljesen lezárják? (Az viszont abandoned.) Üdv: Ákos -ITineris
Removed duplicated Csóványos, since it is not a volcano in itself, I don't add volcato tags to natural peak -vasony

I was only speaking about sidewalks, not paths generally. According to wiki on names of sidewalks: "There is no consensus on whether this is necessary, and regional customs differ." Hungary has a long standing practice of not adding names to sidewalks. I see and understand your points, but it would require a huge job to add a name to all sidewalks in Hungary. I think renderers, route listers should figure out the names of sidewalk. Adding the duplicate name could be mapping for the renderer. And it's not just Hungary, Worldwide only 4% of sidewalks has a name, check taginfo: https://taginfo.openstreetmap.org/tags/footway=sidewalk#combinations -infeeeee
What is your source for 232 m elevation? The current elevation is 116 m, because only the crater of the volcano exists as a lake. -vasony
